comment: For anyone starting a new fitness journey this coming year I ve got two imperative pieces of advice for you that will guarantee you succeed . . Probably too much weight , Hulk . Slow down and work on your form
amr:
# ::snt For anyone starting a new fitness journey this coming year I ve got two imperative pieces of advice for you that will guarantee you succeed . . Probably too much weight , Hulk . Slow down and work on your form
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / get-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / piece
                  :quant 2
                  :mod imperative)
            :ARG0-of (g2 / guarantee-01
                  :ARG1 (s / succeed-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Hulk")))
                  :ARG2 p2))
      :beneficiary (a / anyone
            :ARG0-of (s2 / start-01
                  :ARG1 (j / journey-01
                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG1 (f / fitness)
                        :ARG1-of (n2 / new-01))
                  :time (y / year
                        :ARG1-of (c / come-01)
                        :mod (t / this))))
      :snt2 (s3 / say-01
            :ARG0 ii
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (s4 / slow-down-03
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 (p3 / person)
                        :ARG1 p2)
                  :op2 (w / work-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :ARG1 (f2 / form
                              :poss p2))
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                        :ARG2 (m2 / much)
                        :ARG3 (t2 / too)
                        :mod (p4 / probable)))
            :ARG2 p2))
